title: Cell Room
short_details: It is an old phone-selling platform where a seller can publish his phone's advertisement, sell his cellphone and get payments.

title: ACC Helper
short_details: Here an accountant provide some services and users can give review on it. Admin panel, buyer list, and seller list are also added in the private route.

title: EDUMA
short_details: It is an education platform which provide some attractive courses for beginner Learners.
